doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shafiqul Islam
doctor.specialty: Skin, Sexual Diseases, Allergy, Hair Specialist & Cosmetic Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shafiqul Islam is a Dermatologist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DDV (DU), MD (Dermatology). He is a Associate Professor, Dermatology & Venereology at Institute of Child & Mother Health. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Shafiqul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 12pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).
